articles.description: Jake Daniels, the UK's only openly gay active male professional footballer, speaks about his mental health, Jordan Henderson and the 18 months since coming out.
articles.title: Henderson's Saudi move a 'slap in the face' - Daniels

articles.description: Stephen Kenny's time as Republic of Ireland manager ends after the Football Association of Ireland confirm it will not be renewing his contract.
articles.title: FAI confirm Kenny's exit as Republic manager

articles.description: Barnsley are expelled from the FA Cup for fielding an ineligible player in their first-round replay win at non-league Horsham.
articles.title: Barnsley kicked out of FA Cup for ineligible player

articles.description: There was little fanfare when Frank Soo passed away in 1991, but his story as the first non-white England international has emerged from obscurity since.
articles.title: England's pioneer who died with a tale untold

articles.description: Britain captain Leon Smith says he can "shout loud and proud" about his team as they look beat Serbia - led by Novak Djokovic - in the Davis Cup quarter-finals.
articles.title: GB aim to stop Djokovic and Serbia at Davis Cup

articles.description: Jana Leitzig rewards Leicester manager Willie Kirk's gamble in bringing her on specifically for a penalty shootout as they beat Manchester City in the League Cup.
articles.title: Leitzig helps Leicester upset Man City in League Cup

articles.description: Chantelle Cameron relives her historic victory over Katie Taylor before Saturday's rematch in Dublin.
articles.title: 'I actually did it, I beat Katie Taylor' - Cameron relives historic victory

articles.description: The number of South Asian men's professional footballers in England and Wales rises for the second year in a row, PFA data shows.
articles.title: South Asian pro player numbers rise again - PFA

articles.description: Ronnie O'Sullivan says he is at a "crossroads" with snooker's governing body and could quit the sport if he has to reduce the time he spends in China.
articles.title: O'Sullivan future in doubt as he hits 'crossroads'

articles.description: Australia fight back to beat the Czech Republic 2-1 and clinch their spot in the Davis Cup semi-finals in Malaga.
articles.title: Australia recover to reach Davis Cup semi-finals
